comments.text:
lycrics:

I play this game too much 
I think I missed my lunch 
Must concentrate or I might die
There's creepers everywhere
Safety's extremely rare
How can I survive another day!

Oh well I just don't know but here is what could kill me next!

I could get bombed by a creeper 
Die of starvation
Find myself face to face with the grim reaper
How is this fair, it's only just past noon
Drop 20 blocks off a cliff ledge 
Get buried by this stupid hedge
All my items they're lost and gone forever
Help me help me I'm all out of lives
Please let my health just rise!

Oh great here comes the night
More mobs then in the light
And I don't even have a sword
I'm not even gonna try
Just gonna sit and die
How could I survive another day!

Oh well I just dont know but here is what could kill me next!

I could get shot by a skelly
Bitten by a spider
Holy crap well I'm not much of a fighter
Help me help me I'm all out of lives
Could get lost in the cave
Stolen by an endermen
End up surrounded entirely by zombies
Help me help me I'm all out of lives
And ways I could survive!

I wanna find my way back home
I wanna have a piece of pork to eat
But instead I'm here alone!

Oh well I just dont know but here is what could kill me next!

Help me help me I'm all out of lives!
